::Triggerhappy(Blowpipe)/Hell Drak/Necromancer/Surgital/Cutthroat/::

Triggerhappy saw the shots coming from Orion and Sideswipe.  So did
Blowpipe, and Blowpipe rolled to the side and fired two lazer shots at
Orion.  Triggerhappy was met by Orion and Sideswipe's shots.

"Oh, slag it, I'm gonna ki-" Triggerhappy stopped, "AAIIEEE!"

Triggerhappy gets a not-so-warm welcome from AzureBlade's plasma shots, and
Triggerhappy stumbled forward.

"Cheeeaaappppp shhhooottttt!!!!  RAAAHH!" Triggerhappy yelled.

Triggerhappy's bad day got worse.  Necromancer appeared beside Orion, and
Hell Drak appeared by AzureBlade.

"Hey, let's f*** up this creep!" Hell Drak said to AzureBlade.

"Decepticon enemy, this is your last chance to surr-" Before Necromancer
could finish, Triggerhappy had transformed into jet mode, and flew up and
fired a photon shot from his right cannon at Necromancer.

"Attack," Necromancer yelled, "For the Maximals!"

Necromancer fired 3 lazer discs at Triggerhappy.  Hell Drak fired two shots
at Blowpipe, but Necromancer's shots missed, and so did Hell Drak's, because
Triggerhappy swooped down, cockpit open, and Blowpipe jumped in, and
Triggerhappy went back up and closed the cockpit.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Surgital ignored Alpha Dolphy, he fired a saw blade at Ice.  Then, he turned
around, and fired a big energon net down at Orion and Sideswipe.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Cutthroat saw them attacking, and transformed to creature mode, then flew
over and began trying to keep violently lash out with beak, wings and talons
at Orion, trying to rip him to pieces.
